page.title: 15PROFESSIONAL SPORT IN W.HULL
page.content: Within this 12km area there are the grounds of 2 pro. sports clubs. One is the pro. soccer team Hull City and the other is the pro. rugby league(R.L). CLUB HULL. F.C. HULL CITY were formed in 1904 and their present ground is called Boothferry Park. Their ground capacity is 42000 of whom 9000 are seated. At the end of the 1984-85 season they gained promtion back to the 2nd division for the 1st time since 1978. They have never achieved promotion to division 1 and the farthest they have reached in the F.A. Cup is round 5. Hull F.C. are a top class division 1 pro. R.L.team whose ground is called the Boulevard. HULL were one of the original 22 clubs who formed the northern union, a break away from rugby union in 1895 Hull have won the R.L. championship 6 times and the Challenge Cup twice.
